TEXT.TITLE: FED EXPECTED TO ADD TEMPORARY RESERVES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve is expected to enter the U.S. Government securities market to add temporary reserves, economists said. They expect it to supply the reserves indirectly by arranging around 1.5 of customer repurchase agreements. Federal funds, which averaged 6.22 pct yesterday, opened at six pct and remained there in early trading. Reuter
